scripts.archive: npm run clean && trash .env && GATSBY_SHOULD_ARCHIVE=true GATSBY_SKIP_CREATE_INDEX_PAGES=true GATSBY_POST_END_TIME=$(npx date-cli sub --from monthBeginning --months 2) npm run build && trash ./static && cp -r "./original-static/" ./static/ && cp -r "./public/" ./static/ && echo GATSBY_POST_START_TIME=$(npx date-cli sub --from monthBeginning --months 2) > .env
scripts.archive:dev: npm run clean && trash .env && GATSBY_SHOULD_ARCHIVE=true GATSBY_SKIP_CREATE_INDEX_PAGES=true GATSBY_POST_END_TIME=$(npx date-cli sub --from monthBeginning --months 2) npm run build:dev && trash ./static && cp -r "./original-static/" ./static/ && cp -r "./public/" ./static/ && echo GATSBY_POST_START_TIME=$(npx date-cli sub --from monthBeginning --months 2) > .env
